item.description:
Hi Meetup Members

We organize a “Movie Night” again!!
Every time, the stories are screened with English and Japanese.
So would you like to spend a great time with us and your friends?

Where
Gathering at Malden Center Station (After that we move to the APT)

How
<Use subway>
Take outbound orange line and get off at Malden Center
I’ll wait front of the ticket gate on time(20:00).
- If you join this event, I will send you an e-mail how to go there.

<Use your car>
There are some parking areas around the Malden Center.
But that cost about $6, and I’m not sure whether we can use or not.
So if it possible, please come there by T train to be convenience.

Cost
No money (Free)

What
GOKUSEN
It’s a famous Japanese Drama (screened 2002, 2005 and 2008)
The summary of the story is as below.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Kumiko Yamaguchi — a new teacher— starts teaching at a boy’s high school which is famous for having bad students.
Interestingly, Kumiko is a granddaughter of hoodlumism family, too.
They are involved some problems, but she patch them by teaching
her students a human empathy.
(It’s also included their high school love stories)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This story is screened by Japanese, but English is displayed as caption at the same time. So it’s good for you to learn Japanese and English.

Schedule
20:10～21:00　Screened “Episode 1”
21:00～21:10　Take a rest time
21:10～22:00　Screened “Episode 2”

Etc
I’ll prepare some snacks and drink.
If you like to bring something to eat or drink, and your favorite movies,
you are more than welcome to do so.

I’m looking forward to enjoying with Meetup members!!
Sincerely to you.
